name: A Lively Dilemma
description:
A Lively Dilemma affords you a sojourn through life's misadventures. Choose from the prompts to navigate dilemmas. When you experience the three dilemmas shown at the start, you will find THE SECRET TO LIFE. Each time you play the game will be different — the starting dilemmas are randomized and there's more than one SECRET TO LIFE...

This was a covid-lockdown inspired tweego and javascript project utilizing graphics from an antique board game.  Enjoy!!
